description: Spider's Nest in 46 Wilderness, dig on top of the sapphire spawn
clue: 46 is my number. My body is the colour of burnt orange and crawls among those with eight. Three mouths I have, yet I cannot eat. My blinking blue eye hides my grave.

description: Talk to Larry on the dock east of Rellekka or west of fairy ring code D-K-S to get to the Iceberg. A clockwork suit is required to get to Ping and Pong's room, a clockwork suit is made on a Crafting table 3 with a clockwork, plank, and silk and selecting the following options: Clockwork toy -> Clockwork penguin. Dig in front of the spinning light in Ping and Pong's room inside the Iceberg
clue: 2 musical birds. Dig in front of the spinning light.

requirements: Equip armor that adds up to +100 in magic attack bonus
description: Northeast corner of East Ardougne
clue: A chisel and hammer reside in his home, strange for one of magic. Impress him with your magical equipment.

description: Taverly Dungeon, Catacombs of Kourend, Witchaven Dungeon, Stronghold Slayer Cave, Level 53 Wilderness by the Resource Area
clue: A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue.

requirements: Partial completion of Mourning's Ends Part II
description: At the end of Temple of Light by the death altar entrance, which can be accessed from the Underground Pass at the southern wall off the dwarf camp. It can also be accessed from the Abyss through the death rift and out the portal next to the Death Altar.
clue: A dwarf, approaching death, but very much in the light.

description: North-east of the God Wars Dungeon entrance by the large crossbow
clue: A massive battle rages beneath so be careful when you dig by the large broken crossbow.

description: Cloth shop in Canifis, north-east of the fairy ring C-K-S
clue: A town with a different sort of night-life is your destination. Search for some crates in one of the houses.

description: Etceteria next to the Evergreen tree in front of the castle walls, east of the fairy ring C-I-P
clue: And so on, and so on, and so on. Walking from the land of many unimportant things leads to a choice of paths.

description: Upstairs at Almera's House, north of Baxtorian Falls
clue: A great view - watch the rapidly drying hides get splashed. Check the box you are sitting on.

description: Druids' Circle north of Taverley and south from Burthorpe
clue: A Guthixian ring lies between two peaks. Search the stones and you'll find what you seek.

description: Lumbridge Church
clue: A reck you say; let's pray there aren't any ghosts.

description: Monastery near Edgeville
clue: 'A bag belt only?', he asked his balding brothers.

description: Upstairs at East Ardougne Church, west from East Ardougne centre
challenge: Search the crate at East Ardougne Church upstairs
clue: A crate found in the tower of a church is your next location.

description: Draynor Village outside the window of Aggie the Witch's house
clue: Aggie I see, Lonely and southern I feel I am neither inside nor outside the house yet no house would be complete without me. Your treasure lies beneath me.

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 2 Steps North, 3 Steps East, 3 Steps South, 1 Step West from the fairy ring
clue: AIR 2331

description: Waterbirth Island Dungeon by the ladder leading to the Dagannoth Kings room
clue: A ring of water surrounds 4 powerful rings. Dig by the ladder that is located there.

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig on the Pink Starfish south-east from the fairy ring
clue: AIQ 0440

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 1 step North, 1 step East, 4 steps South from the center of the fairy ring
clue: ALP 1140

description: Monastery near Edgeville
challenge: Talk to Abbot Langley with negative prayer bonus (only possible with Ancient Staff)
clue: Anger Abbot Langley.

description: Port Sarim Docks
challenge: Try to charter a ship to Entrana with armour or weapons equipped
clue: Anger those who adhere to Saradomin's edicts to prevent travel.

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 6 steps North and 2 steps East from the center of the fairy ring
clue: BLP 6200

description: Belladonna farming patch at Draynor Manor
clue: Belladonna, my dear. If only I had gloves, then I could hold you at last.

description: Clan Wars by the Clan Cup Trophy
clue: Between where the best are commemorated for a year, and a celebratory cup, not just for beer.

requirements: Holy Grail, until you rescue King Percival and Fishing Realm has been restored, Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 1 step North, 1 step East, 2 steps South, 3 steps West from the center of the fairy ring
clue: BJR 1123

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 7 steps North, 1 step South, 3 steps West from the center of the fairy ring
clue: BIP 7013

description: Speak to Jorral to receive a strange device. Use this device to play Hot and Cold to find the digging spot
clue: Buried beneath the ground, who knows where it's found. Lucky for you, A man called Jorral may have a clue.

requirements: 80k coins (to unlock fairy ring), Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 9 steps West from the center of the fairy ring
clue: CIS 0009

description: Talk to Heckel Funch on the second floor at the Grand Tree
clue: Citric cellar.

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 2 steps East, 2 steps South, 4 steps West from the center of the fairy ring
clue: CKP 0224

description: Slayer Tower, Second Floor
challenge: Talk to Viggora with a Ring of Visibility and Ghostspeak Amulet
clue: Come brave adventurer, your sense is on fire. If you talk to me, it's an old god you desire.

description: Talk to Miner Magnus east of the fairy ring C-I-P on Miscellania.
clue: Come have a cip with this great soot covered denizen.

description: Edgeville, east of the Southern Yew tree
clue: Come to the evil ledge, Yew know yew want to. Try not to get stung.

description: Centre of Mort'ton, south from the general store
clue: Covered in shadows, the centre of the circle is where you will find the answer.

description: Biblia walks around the top floor of Arceuus House Library's, south from fairy ring C-I-P
clue: Darkness wanders around me, but fills my mind with knowledge.

description: East of the northern Falador gate between three standing stones
clue: Dig between some ominous stones in Falador.

description: Dig where Kamil was fought from Desert Treasure.
clue: Dig in front of the icy arena where 1 of 4 was fought.

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 8 steps North, 5 steps East, 1 step South, 1 step West from the center of the fairy ring
clue: DIP 8511

requirements: Draman Staff or Lunar Staff, Spade
description: Dig 2 steps North, 3 steps East, 1 step South from the center of the fairy ring
clue: DKS 2310

description: Dig in front of the large statue in the centre of Great Kourend
clue: Dig in the centre of a great city of 5 districts.

description: Dig near the red mushrooms northwest of the Grand Tree
clue: Dig near some giant mushrooms behind the Grand Tree.

description: West from Burgh de Rott in the Abandoned Mine on the toad batta spawn in Tarn's Lair
clue: Dig under Razorlor's toad batta.

description: Champion's Guild in the chicken pen, south from Varrock
clue: Dig where 4 siblings and I all live with our evil overlord.
Dig where only the skilled, the wealthy, or the brave can choose not to visit again.

description: Next to the law rift, north-east in the Abyss
clue: Dig where the forces of Zamorak and Saradomin collide.

description: The Kalphite area within the Stronghold Slayer Cave next to the Entomologist
clue: Desert insects is what I see, Taking care of them was my responsibility. Your solution is found by digging near me.

description: Haracio is in the garden of the Handelmort Mansion in East Ardougne
clue: Dobson is my last name, and with gardening I seek fame.

description: Seers Village on the Seers Agility Course
clue: Even the seers say this clue goes right over their heads.

description: North path to Relleka from Seers Village
clue: Falo the bard wants to see you.

description: Dig at the end of the Deep Wilderness Dungeon by the south pillar
clue: Faint sounds of 'Arr', fire giants found deep, the eastern tip of a lake, are the rewards you could reap.

description: Dig by the fire at Rogues' Den in Burthorpe Inn basement
clue: Fiendish cooks probably wont dig the dirty dishes.

description: South of Ardougne in the Monastery on the east side
clue: Find a crate close to the monks that like to paaarty!

description: Top floor of the Lumbridge windmill
clue: Four blades I have, yet draw no blood; Still I turn my prey to powder. If you are brave, come search my roof; It is there my blades are louder.

description: Talk to General Bentnoze in Goblin Village, north from Falador
clue: Generally speaking, his nose was very bent.

requirements: Armor/Weapon that can add up to a Melee Strength bonus of over 100
description: Warriors' Guilds entrance by Burthorpe
challenge: Talk to Ghommal with a total Melee Strength bonus of over 100
clue: Ghommal wishes to be impressed by how strong your equipment is.

description: Fourth level of Stronghold of Security, Catacombs of Kourend, Stronghold Slayer Cave
clue: Ghostly bones.

description: Burthorpe
challenge: Kill Penda in Burthorpe Bar to obtain the key, then search the drawers in Dunstan's house
clue: Go to the village being attacked by trolls, search the drawers in one of the houses.

requirements: Start the Horror from the Deep Quest and speak to Gunnjorn to obtain the Lighthouse key
description: A marketplace guard is in Relleka and the drawers is on the second floor of the Lighthouse (Fairy Ring A-L-P)
challenge: Kill Rellekka marketplace guard to get a key, then open drawers in the Lighthouse
clue: Go to this building to be illuminated, and check the drawers while you are there.

description: Speak to Saniboch by the Brimhaven Dungeon entrance.
clue: Gold I see, yet gold I require. Give me 875 if death you desire.

description: Dig by the runite rock in Lava Maze Dungeon
clue: Great demons, dragons, and spiders protect this blue rock, beneath which, you may find what you seek.

requirements: Partial completion of Troll Romance, Sled, Spade
description: Trollweiss Mountain by Trollweiss Flowers
clue: Green is the colour of my death as the winter-guise, I swoop towards the ground.

description: Dig at the tip of a lava lake, west of the Mage Arena
clue: Guthix left his mark in a fiery lake, dig at the tip of it.

description: Near the Clay golem in the ruins of Uzer
clue: His head might be hollow, but the crates nearby are filled with surprises.

description: Canifis Cloth Shop
clue: His bark is worse than his bite.

description: Clocktower, south from East Ardougne
clue: He knows just how easy it is to lose track of time.

requirements: White Full Helm, White Platebody, White Platelegs
description: White Knights' Castle in Falador in the eastern part of the 3rd floor
challenge: Talk to Sir Vyvin while wearing a white full helm, platebody, and platelegs
clue: Hopefully this set of armor will help you to keep surviving.

requirements: Guthix armor like Rune Guthix armour, Void Knight equipment or Book of Balance
description: Tears of Guthix, in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves
challenge: Talk to Juna while wearing three Guthix related items.
clue: Here, there are tears, but nobody is crying. Speak to the guardian and show off your alignment to balance.

requirements: Partial completion of Legends' Quest, Pickaxe, Unpowered Orb, Lockpick (multiple recommended), Spade, and any Charge Orb spell
description: Viyeldi caves, north-west part of Kharazi Jungle and squeeze into a rock
clue: If you're feeling brave, dig beneath the dragon's eye.

description: Monastery near Edgeville
clue: Impossible to make angry

description: Closest chicken can be found by the Ranging Guild entrance; the drawers can be found south of the Elemental Workshop entrance in Seers' Village
challenge: Kill any Chicken to obtain a key, then search the drawers in Seers' Village
clue: In a town where everyone has perfect vision, seek some locked drawers in a house that sits opposite a workshop.

description: East Ardougne
challenge: Kill a Guard dog at Handelmort Mansion to get a key, then search the drawers in the pub upstairs north of Ardougne Castle.
clue: In a town where the guards are armed with maces, search the upstairs rooms of the Public House.

description: Guards can be found East Ardougne centre; the drawers are found in a building by pigeon cages upstairs
challenge: Kill any Guard located around East Ardougne for a key, then search the drawers upstairs the building south from the bank in Ardougne
clue: In a town where thieves steal from stalls, search for some drawers in the upstairs of a house near the bank.

description: Yanille
challenge: Kill a Man in a building north from Wizards' Guild in Yanille for a key, then go upstairs and open a chest
clue: In a town where wizards are known to gather, search upstairs in a large house to the north.

description: East of a house by the entrance of Tai Bwo Wannai
clue: In a village made of bamboo, look for some crates under one of the houses.

description: Next to River Elid, south from Pollnivneach
clue: In a while...

description: West from Varrock at the Cooks' Guild
clue: In the city where merchants are said to have lived, talk to a man with a splendid cape, but a hat dropped by goblins.

description: West Varrock bank in the basement by the gate
clue: I am a token of the greatest love. I have no beginning or end. My eye is red, I can fit like a glove. Go to the place where it's money they lend, And dig by the gate to be my friend.

description: Catherby
clue: I burn between heroes and legends.

requirements: 70 Agility, Spade, Rope, any Saradomin and Zamorak item (to avoid getting attacked)
description: Dig immediately after climbing down to Saradomin's encampment in the God Wars Dungeon
clue: I lie beneath the first descent to the holy encampment.

description: Dig under the crossbow respawn in the Graveyard of Shadows
clue: I lie lonely and forgotten in mid wilderness, where the dead rise from their beds. Feel free to quarrel and wind me up and dig while you shoot their heads.

description: Fish Shop in Port Sarim
clue: If a man carried my burden, he would break his back. I am not rich, but leave silver in my track. Speak to the keeper of my trail.

description: Northern part of the Dwarven Mine
clue: It seems to have reached the end of the line, and it's still empty.

description: Talk to Ellena at Catherby fruit tree patch.
clue: I watch the sea. I watch you fish. I watch your tree.

requirements: 130 Combined Attack and Strength Level to enter Warriors' Guild
description: Top floor of the Warriors' Guild
clue: I am the one who watches the giants. The giants in turn watch me. I watch with two while they watch with one. Come seek where I may be.

requirements: Spirits of the Elid, Rope, Lightsource
description: Enter the crack west of Nardah
clue: I live in a deserted crack collecting soles.

description: Talk to Hamid by the altar in the Duel Arena
clue: Identify the back of this over-acting brother. (He's a long way from home)

description: South corner of the Rangers' Guild
clue: If you look closely enough, it seems that the archers have lost more than their needles.

description: Edgeville Dungeon
clue: I wonder how many bronze swords he has handed out.

description: Talk to the Spirit Tree in Tree Gnome Village
clue: I have many arms but legs, I have just one, I have little family but my seed, You can grow on, I am not dead, yet I am but a spirit, and my power on your quests, you will earn the right to free it.

description: Hosidius House Church
clue: I wouldn't wear this jean on my legs.

description: Building west from Rimmington
clue: I would make a chemistry joke, but I'm afraid I wouldn't get a reaction.

description: God Wars Dungeon
clue: Kill the spiritual, magic and godly whilst representing their own god

description: Neitiznot
clue: Leader of the Yak City.

requirements: Receive instructions from Otto Godblessed to do funeral pyre burning for a corpse in Ancient Cavern as part of the Barbarian Training
description: Ancient Cavern, in a whirlpool south from Barbarian Assault
clue: Let's hope you don't meet a watery death when you encounter this fiend.

description: In a house east of the east bank in Falador
clue: Look in the ground floor crates of houses in Falador.

description: Dig directly underneath the Red spiders' eggs respawn inside Karamja Volcano
clue: Mine was the strangest birth under the sun. I left the crimson sack, yet life had not begun. Entered the world, and yet was seen by none.

description: North from the Graveyard of Shadows or north-west from the Corporeal Beast Dungeon
clue: Mix yellow with blue and add heat, make sure you bring protection.

description: Upstairs in the chapel at the Hosidius House, south from the player-owned house portal
challenge: Search the drawers upstairs in the chapel at the Hosidius House
clue: Monk's residence in the far west. See robe storage device.

description: Around the hut close to the start of the Dwarf Cannon quest
clue: Must be full of railings.

description: The drawers is inside the room with a spinning wheel on the second floor of Lumbridge Castle
clue: My home is grey, and made of stone; A castle with a search for a meal. Hidden in some drawers I am, across from a wooden wheel.

description: Talk to Wilough at Varrock Square
clue: My name is like a tree, yet it is spelt with a 'g'. Come see the fur which is right near me.

requirements: A slash weapon or knife from Varrock Sewers or 51 Agility from Edgeville Dungeon
description: Dig near the cauldron by Moss Giants under Varrock Sewers
clue: My giant guardians below the market streets would be fans of rock and roll, if only they could grab hold of it. Dig near my green bubbles!

description: Cerberus Lair, which is accessed from Taverley Dungeon
clue: My life was spared but these voices remain, now guarding these iron gates is my bane.

description: Port Sarim at the dock
clue: One of the sailors in Port Sarim is your next destination.

requirements: 7500 coins (6,000 if the medium, 3,750 if the hard, or free if the elite Wilderness diary is completed) to go into the Resource Area
description: Resource Area
clue: One of several rhyming brothers, in business attire with an obsession for paper work.

description: Talk to an examiner at the Exam Centre
clue: Often sought out by scholars of histories past, find me where words of wisdom speak volumes.

description: Basement of the Wizard's Tower in Sedridor's room
clue: Probably filled with books on magic.

description: Wizard's Tower basement
challenge: Kill a Wizard for a key. Search the drawers down the basement in the room at the east
clue: Probably filled with wizards socks.

description: Dig under the blood rune spawn next to the Demonic Ruins.
clue: Pentagrams and demons, burnt bones and remains, I wonder what the blood contains.

description: Relleka Slayer Cave, east from fairy ring A-J-R
clue: Reflection is the weakness for these eyes of evil.

description: Dig right under the fairy ring B-I-P
clue: Right on the blessed border, cursed by the evil ones. On the spot inaccessible by both; I will be waiting. The bugs imminent possession holds the answer.

requirements: Armor/Weapon that adds up to 181 ranged attack bonus
description: The inn in Port Phasmatys
challenge: Talk to robin with 181 ranged attack bonus or more
clue: Robin wishes to see your finest range equipment.

description: South-east from Burgh de Rott
clue: Rotting next to a ditch. Dig next to the fish

description: Search the northern bookcase on the 2nd floor of the Sorcerer's Tower
clue: Read 'How to breed scorpions.' By O.W.Thathurt.

description: King Black Dragon Lair is east from level 44 Wilderness Obelisk and west from the Lava Maze
challenge: Kill a King Black Dragon for a key. Open a chest with the key
clue: Scattered coins and gems fill the floor. The chest you seek is in the north east.

description: Lumbridge Swamp in Father Urhney's house
clue: Search a bookcase in Lumbridge swamp.

description: Ground floor in the Wizards tower
clue: Search a bookcase in the Wizards tower.

description: Upstairs on The Haymaker's Arms Inn east from the Catacombs of Kourend
challenge: Search crates upstairs The Haymaker's Arms Inn
clue: Search a crate in the Haymaker's arms.

description: Aggie's house on the northern wall in Draynor Village
clue: Search a wardrobe in Draynor.

description: Upstairs in a Food Store at Port Sarim
clue: Search chests found in the upstairs of shops in Port Sarim.

description: Southeastern bookcase at Edgeville Monastery
clue: Search the bookcase in the monastery.

description: Sword shop at Taverley
clue: Search the boxes in a shop in Taverley.

description: Al Kharid south from Ali Morrisane
clue: Search the boxes in one of the tents in Al Kharid.

description: Lumbridge east side of the river
clue: Search the boxes in the goblin house near Lumbridge.

description: The first house to the west when entering Varrock from the southern entrance.
clue: Search the boxes in the house near the south entrance to Varrock.

description: Outside the Platemail Body Shop
clue: Search the boxes just outside the Armour shop in East Ardounge.

description: Falador general store
clue: Search the boxes of Falador's general store.

description: Players can only enter the jail cell by incriminating yourself at the Shantay Pass. Talk to Shantay, ask what the place is then identify yourself as an outlaw. Once you are sent to the jail, refuse to pay the 5gp fine twice and you will be sent to the Port Sarim jail.
clue: Search the bucket in the Port Sarim jail.

description: The bush is on the east side of the most left pathway towards the digsite from the Exam Centre.
clue: Search the bush at the digsite centre.

description: South-west from Seers' Village
clue: Search for a crate in a building in Hemenster.

description: Barbarian Village, in the building with a spinning wheel
clue: Search the chest in Barbarian Village.

description: Duke's room is on the 2nd floor of Lumbridge Castle, upstairs
clue: Search the chest in the Duke of Lumbridge's bedroom.

description: Crossbow Shop in the Dwarven Mine on the western wall
clue: Search the chests in the Dwarven Mine.

description: Top floor of the western tower in Camelot Castle
clue: Search the chest in the left-hand tower of Camelot Castle.

description: Al Kharid Palace upstairs, the chest to the right
clue: Search the chests upstairs in Al Kharid Palace.

description: Edgeville by the Wilderness Teleport Lever
clue: Search the Coffin in Edgeville.

description: Second floor the southern tower by the Lumbridge Castle entrance.
clue: Search the crate in the left-hand tower of Lumbridge Castle.

description: Varrock Castle kitchen
clue: Search for a crate in Varrock Castle.

description: South of a pub in Seers' Village
clue: Search for a crate on the ground floor of a house in Seers' Village.

description: Next to the General Store in Port Khazard
clue: Search the crate near a cart in Port Khazard.

description: South-east of Varrock Palace, south of the tree farming patch.
clue: Search the crates near a cart in Varrock.

description: Varrock basement
clue: Search the crates in a bank in Varrock.

description: North from Wizards' Guild in Yanille
clue: Search the crates in a house in Yanille that has a piano.

description: Canifis Food Shop, east from fairy ring C-K-S
clue: Search the crates in Canifis.

description: Draynor Manor top floor
clue: Search the crates in Draynor Manor.

description: Armour Shop at Varrock
clue: Search the crates in Horvik's armoury.

description: Helmet Shop at Barbarian Village
clue: Search the crates in the Barbarian Village helmet shop.

description: Dwarven Mine Mining Shop
clue: Search the crates in the Dwarven mine.

description: Building east from the north bank of East Ardougne
clue: Search the crates in the guard house of the northern gate of East Ardougne.

description: Shed connected to a fence in Taverly
clue: Search the crates in the outhouse of the long building in Taverley.

description: Shed north of the northern Ardougne bank.
clue: Search the crates in the shed just north of East Ardougne.

description: Building north of Al Kharid, closest to the gnome glider
clue: Search the crates in most north-western house in Al Kharid.

description: Fishing Shop at Port Sarim
clue: Search the crates in the Port Sarim Fishing shop.

description: Bar in Burthorpe.
clue: Search the crate in the Toad and Chicken pub.

description: Upstairs at the Clothes shop in Varrock
clue: Search the drawers above Varrock's shops.

description: Upstairs at the bar north of the Ardougne Castle.
clue: Search the drawers found upstairs in East Ardougne's houses.

description: Most northern house in Draynor Village
clue: Search the drawers in a house in Draynor Village.

description: Archer shop at Catherby
clue: Search the drawers in Catherby's Archery shop.

description: Chain mail shop at Falador
clue: Search the drawers in Falador's chain mail shop.

description: Hunting shop at Yanille
clue: Search the drawers in the ground floor of a shop in Yanille.

description: Building east from Port Sarim Magic Shop
clue: Search the drawers in the house next to the Port Sarim mage shop.

description: Upstairs in a house north from Catherby bank
clue: Search the drawers in the upstairs of a house in Catherby.

description: Gertrude house west from Varrock
clue: Search the drawers in one of Gertrude's bedrooms.

description: Building north-east corner of Burthorpe
clue: Search the drawers of houses in Burthorpe.

description: Upstairs a building north from Ardougne centre
clue: Search the drawers on the first floor of a building overlooking Ardougne's Market.

description: Upstairs in the Falador Shield Shop
clue: Search the drawers upstairs in Falador's shield shop.

description: Upstairs a building next to East Falador water fountain
clue: Search the drawers upstairs of houses in eastern part of Falador.

description: Upstairs Varrock East Bank
clue: Search the drawers, upstairs in the bank to the East of Varrock.

description: Upstairs a building north from Hetty the Witch's house
clue: Search through some drawers in the upstairs of a house in Rimmington.

description: House closest to the Herb Shop at Taverley
clue: Search through some drawers found in Taverley's houses.

description: South from Ardougne church
clue: Search the crates in East Ardougne's general store.

description: The house east of the Mess in Great Kourend.
clue: Search the open crate found in a small farmhouse in Hosidius. Cabbages grow nearby.

description: Most north-western tent closest to Warriors' Guild at Burthorpe
clue: Search the tents in the Imperial Guard camp in Burthorpe for some boxes.

description: Pirates can be found at Burthorpe bar, and the drawers can be found upstairs east from the bar
challenge: Get a key from a Pirate. Search drawers.
clue: Search the upstairs drawers of a house in a village where pirates are known to have a good time.

description: Rimmington Mines
clue: Search the wheelbarrow in Rimmington mine.

description: Upstairs in a building north-east from East Bank
clue: Search through chests found in the upstairs of houses in eastern Falador.

description: Upstairs, in a room where a spinning wheel can be found at Seers' Village
clue: Search upstairs in the houses of Seers' Village for some drawers.

description: Nightmare Zone by Yanille north-east entrance
clue: 'See you in your dreams' said the vegetable man.

description: South of the Lovakengj House Blast Mine
clue: She's small but can build both literally and figuratively, as long as you have their favour

description: Arceuus House Library's ground floor, south from Fairy Ring C-I-S
clue: Shhhh!

description: Duel Arena
clue: Someone watching the fights in the Duel Arena is your next destination.

description: Dig in front of the Shilo Village furnace
clue: South of a river in a town surrounded by the undead, what lies beneath the furnace?

description: South from Catherby Bank
clue: Speak to Arhein in Catherby.

description: Tanner of Al Kharid
clue: Speak to Ellis in Al Kharid.

description: Gnome ball referee found on the Gnome Ball Field in the Gnome Stronghold
clue: Speak to a referee.

description: Upstairs Sinclair Mansion north Seers' Village
challenge: Talk to Donovan the Family Handyman
clue: Speak to Donovan, the Family Handyman.

description: North of Falador
clue: Speak to Doric, who lives north of Falador.

description: Sword Shop in Taverley
clue: Speak to Gaius in Taverley.

description: Walking around Lumbridge Castle
clue: Speak to Hans to solve the clue.

description: South from Brimhaven docks by a cart
clue: Speak to Hajedy.

description: East of Yanille, next to the fairy ring C-L-S
clue: Speak to Hazelmere.

description: Heblore Shop in Taverly
clue: Speak to Jatix in Taverley.

description: Shrimp and Parrot in Brimhaven
clue: Speak to Kangai Mau.

description: North or the Draynor bank
clue: Speak to Ned in Draynor Village.

description: North east from Falador
clue: Speak to Rusty north of Falador

description: Falador Farm, south from Falador
clue: Speak to Sarah at Falador farm.

description: Camelot Castle
clue: Speak to Sir Kay in Camelot Castle.

description: The bar in Varrock
clue: Speak to the bartender of the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock.

description: Taverley
challenge: Talk to the Lady of the Lake
clue: Speak to the Lady of the Lake.

description: Upstairs Sinclair Mansion north Seers' Village
clue: Speak to the staff of Sinclair mansion.

description: Gate to Mort Myre Swamp, next to fairy ring C-K-S
clue: Speak to Ulizius.

description: Varrock Palace
clue: Surprising? I bet he is...

description: Walking around Lumbridge Castle
clue: Snah? I feel all confused, like one of those cakes...

description: White Knights' Castle in Falador in the eastern part of the 3rd floor
clue: Surviving.

description: Falador Gem Store
clue: Surrounded by white walls and gems.

description: Tree Gnome Stronghold Agility Training Arena
clue: 'Small shoe.' Often found with rod on mushroom.

description: South of Seer's Village
challenge: Talk to Sherlock for a challenge
clue: Show this to Sherlock

requirements: Started Mourning's Ends Part I, Mourner Gear
description: Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne, or east from slayer ring teleport, Dark Beast
clue: Stop crying! Talk to the head.

description: Falador Park
clue: Speak to a Wyse man.

description: Canifis Bar, east from fairy ring C-K-S
clue: Speak to Roavar.

description: South from West Varrock Bank
clue: Strength potions with red spiders' eggs? He is quite a herbalist.

description: Hosidius House by a saltpetre, south-east from a Bank
clue: Salty peter.

requirements: Receive instructions from Otto Godblessed to do funeral pyre burning for a corpse in Ancient Cavern as part of the Barbarian Training, any log, tinderbox, an axe
description: Kill a confused barbarian or lost barbarian within the Ancient Cavern to receive mangled bones. Go back up top by the whirlpool to construct a pyre ship with mangled bones, a tinderbox, logs, and an axe. Kill the Ferocious Barbarian Spirit that spawns to receive a clue casket.
challenge: Get mangled bones, Construct a pyre, Kill a Ferocious Barbarian Spirit
clue: Surround my bones in fire, ontop the wooden pyre. Finally lay me to rest, before my one last test.

description: Walks all around the Second Floor of Falador Castle, upstairs from ground floor
clue: Talk to Ambassador Spanfipple in the White Knights Castle.

description: Upstairs in Falador Party Room
clue: Talk to a party-goer in Falador.

description: Falador Shield Shop
clue: Talk to Cassie in Falador.

description: South-east from Gnome Agility Course
clue: Talk to Ermin.

description: Falador Barber Shop
clue: Talk to the barber in the Falador barber shop.

description: Port Sarim Bar
clue: Talk to the bartender of the Rusty Anchor in Port Sarim.

description: Outside of Lumbridge Castle
clue: Talk to the Doomsayer.

description: The house west of Edgeville bank
clue: Talk to the mother of a basement dwelling son.

description: White Knights' Castle Courtyard
clue: Talk to the Squire in the White Knights' castle in Falador.

description: Al Kharid Scimitar Shop
clue: Talk to Zeke in Al Kharid.

description: Fishing Shop East of Piscarilius House Bank
clue: Thanks Grandma!

description: Top of White Wolf Mountain
clue: This aviator is at the peak of his profession.

description: Hosidius House Mess Hall in Great Kourend
clue: This place sure is a mess.

description: Bandit Camp in the General Store tent
clue: The cheapest water for miles around, but they react badly to religious icons.

description: North-eastern corner of the Shadow Dungeon.
clue: The far north eastern corner where 1 of 4 was defeated, the shadows still linger.

description: Dig in front of the small furnace in Piscatoris Fishing Colony, north from fairy ring A-K-Q
clue: The beasts retreat, for their Queen is gone; the song of this town still plays on. Dig near the birthplace of a blade, be careful not to melt your spade.

description: Male Barbarian can be found at Barbarian Outpost (picture) or Barbarian Village. The chest is located underneath the Red Dragon's head in the Exam Centre
challenge: Kill a male Barbarian for a key. Open a chest.
clue: The dead, red dragon watches over this chest. He must really dig the view.

description: Small house near the sacrificial boat at Zul-Andra, east from fairy ring B-J-S
clue: The mother of the reptilian sacrifice.

description: Dig in front of the entrance to the Waterbirth Island Dungeon
clue: Three rule below and three sit at top. Come dig at my entrance.

description: Talk to Jeb to sail to the Fishing Platform. The house is at the south-western side of the Fishing Platform
clue: Try not to step on any aquatic nasties while searching this crate.

description: Behind the most northern building inside the Ranging Guild
clue: This crate holds a better reward than a broken arrow.

requirements: Partial Completion of Tourist Trap, Metal Key
description: Kill Mercenary Captain for a Metal Key and the crate should be next to a wagon in the Desert Mining Camp
clue: This crate is mine, all mine, even if it is in the middle of the desert.

description: In a building south-east of the Shilo Village Gem Mine
clue: This village has a problem with cartloads of the undead. Try checking the bookcase to find an answer.

description: Dig by a torch in Ardougne Zoo
clue: The beasts to my east snap claws and tails, The rest to my west can slide and eat fish. The force to my north will jump and they'll wail, Come dig by my fire and make a wish.

description: Edgeville
clue: The keeper of Melzars...Spare? Skeleton? Anar?

requirements: Partial completion of Icthlarin's Little Helper
description: Try all four entrances of Pyramid Plunder minigame in Sophanem to find the Guardian Mummy
clue: The King's magic won't be wasted by me.

description: Located by the manhole in Port Sarim
clue: The hand ain't listening!

description: Small building at the Rag and Bone Man's site, east of Varrock
clue: The treasure is buried in a small building full of bones. Here is a hint: it's not near a graveyard.

description: Elf Camp
clue: There is no 'worthier' lord.

description: Top floor of Wizard Tower by fairy ring D-I-S
clue: The magic of 4 colours, an early experience you could learn. The large beast caged up top, rages, as his demised kin's loot now returns.

description: Barbarian Village by the Stronghold of Security entrance
clue: THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!!!! But they were here first. Dig for treasure where the ground is rich with ore.

description: Varrock Museum downstairs south exhibit, next to the Terrorbird display
clue: Under a giant robotic bird that cannot fly.

description: Varrock Square Gypsy Tent
clue: Varrock is where I reside not the land of the dead, but I am so old, I should be there instead. Let's hope your reward is as good as it says, just 1 gold one and you can have it read.

requirements: Total of 130 Attack and Strength levels, Spade
description: Warriors' Guild
clue: W marks the spot.

description: The house with the cooking range in Entrana
clue: When no weapons are at hand, now it is time to reflect, in Saradomin's name! Redemption draws closer...

description: Fall from the ledge or pray at the Zamorak altar to fall to the poison spiders
clue: When you get tired of fighting, go deep, deep down until you need an antidote.

description: Varrock south-east altar
challenge: Talk to the Mage of Zamorak wearing 3 Zamorak items
clue: Where safe to speak, the man who offers the pouch of smallest size wishes to see your alignment.

description: Ape Atoll, Daga sells scimitars
clue: With a name like that, you'd expect a little more than just a few scimitars.

description: Slayer Tower Second Floor, Kourend Catacombs, Stronghold Slayer Cave
clue: You'll get licked.

description: Slayer Tower Second Floor, Stronghold Slayer Cave
clue: You'll have to plug your nose if you use this source of herbs.

description: Monks can be found at the Ardougne Monastery. Chest can be found by the stairs in Varrock church
challenge: Kill a monk for a key. Search a chest.
clue: You'll need to look for a town with a central fountain. Look for a locked chest in the town's chapel.

requirements: Started Elemental Workshop I, Battered Key
description: You can get a battered key by using a knife on the Battered book in a bookshelf a house across the road from the anvils.
clue: You have all of the elements available to solve this clue. Fortunately you do not have to go as far as to stand in a draft.

description: West from fairy ring, D-K-S
clue: You might have to turn over a few stones to progress.

description: South-west part of God Wars Dungeon
clue: You will have to fly high where a sword cannot help you.

description: Lumbridge Basement
clue: You will need to under-cook to solve this one.

description: Pest Control
challenge: Talk to a Veteran boat squire
clue: You must be 100 to play with me.

description: Edgeville Dungeon
clue: You were 3 and I was the 6th. Come speak to me.
